text: sitha pawennata thathananawa .

me bawa jathyanthara paramanu balashakthi adhikariya wisin thahawuru kirimen pasuwa iranayata erehi aarthika sambadhaka lihil kirima sandaha awashya awasan katayuththada siduwa athi bawin owunta nawathath jathyanthara borathel welandapolata athulu wimatath, dolar biliyana 100k pamana wiya haki wides banku wala athi owunge sanchitha prayojanayata ganimatath awasthawa labenu atha.

me rata thula antharjalaya bhawitha karamin chinaye kotipathi wyaparikayange banku ginumwalin amarikan dolar miliyanaganan wancha kala bawa kiyana sakakara china jathikayin 17 deneku lankawen pituwahal karana lesata kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath rashmi singappuli mahatha eeye (25) niyama kaleya.chnaye sanwidhanathmaka aparadha kalliyaka samajikayin wana china jathika kanthawan 6k ha tharunayin 11deneku mese pituwahal kirimata niyama wina.mema niyogaya aagamana wigamana palakawarayata danum dena lesata mahesthrathwaraya mehidi rahas polisiyata danum dunneya.brijin jathyanthara polisiye sthanadhipathi shan wikan mahatha rahas polisiyata karana lada paminillakata anuwa aparadha parikshana departhamenthu niladharin mema sakakaruwan 17dena athadanguwata gena thibe.sakakaruwan china jathika kanthawak wana shan wichen nam ayata ayath banku ginumaka rupiyal 12,661,000ka mudalak antharjalaya bhawitha karamin melesa wancha kara atha.antharjalaye woyis chat magin sakakaruwan thorathuru labagena mema wanchawa sidu kara atha.ayi pi anka sambandha wimarshana pawathwimedi lanka kom aayathanayata ayath antharjala sewa laba gath grahakayin thideneku pilibadawa thorathuru polisiyata anawaranaya wi thibe.rajagiriye padinchi prasanna withanage yana ayata ayath niwesaka sakakaruwan radi sitiyadi rahas polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena athi athara mbaahu danata thayilanthaye padinchi bawata polisiyata karunu anawaranaya wi thibe.pitasthara pudgalayinta niwesata athulu wiya nohaki aakarayata sakakaruwan niwase aarakshaka widhiwidhana yoda thibu bawata polisiya adhikaranayata pawasiya..
